SENT.plain: This case report describes the use of Rituximab for in vivo purging (by intravenous infusion) in a 12 years old boy with second remission of pre-B ALL
It was followed by conditioning therapy consisted of Busulphan and Cyclophosphamide
rh-G-CSF primed stem cells from an HLA identical sibling donor were infused
Standard graft versus host disease prophylaxis was given
He did not develop acute graft versus host disease (aGvHD) but localized chronic GvHD developed
He had been on regular follow-up at CMH, Rawalpindi and is in complete remission 13 months post-PBSCT with no evidence of chronic GvHD at present
